column4: Do I need to change unallocated HD space to the same Ext3 format as Ubuntu in order to combine the partitions?
which I don't think is the actual ubuntu
one thing: gparted is secure.  I never had one single problem with.
there are 2 types of partitions: Primary and Extended. MAX: Primary = 4. Extended = 255 (but the Extended partition is one of the four primary...). Nothing to do with ext3.  I guess...
